text:
I am sorry if I am in the wrong spot.. I have looked everywhere for something that seems like it should be so simple. How do I get this to work?  I just want to grab a value from a HubSpot form field. This is NOT an embedded form.. its right in HS and I am adding to my main js file

var industry = $( "input[name*='application']" ).val();
Or.. how do i grab any values from HS forms?
Search for HubSpot form on ready event
I have done that.. I get "Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected identifier" does that only work for embedded forms or does it work on HubSpot website?
Unexpected identifier is a missing dot or semicolon normally
<@U38EZFVFE> Can I DM you? I need 5 min..
